name: Super Moon Shooter
description:
Hi,

This game is very much inspired by Vampire Survivors. The game is currently living rent free in my head. I made this over a couple nights huffing Monster Energy for the A2B2 Game Jam.

Little Tips:

-Power ups stack with themselves nigh infinitely

-This game is not balanced even slightly

-Sound warning towards the middle of the game

Hope you don't hate it,

Lomoch
